==Chinese==
{{zh-forms|alt=憳忒}}

===Glyph origin===
Ideogrammatic, from {{zh-l|*上|up}}, {{zh-l|*下|down}} and {{zh-l|*心|heart}}.

===Etymology 1===
Word etymology unknown. Earliest attestation was in {{w|Song Dynasty}}, when the word was pronounced like *''tam tik''. Likely reduplicative in origin, of a type akin to Vietnamese {{m|vi|từ láy}}, from an onomatopoeic root ''*tik'' meaning “to palpitate”. Compare {{zh-l|忒忒|tètè < *tik tik|to throb (abnormally)}} as well as Vietnamese {{m|vi|thấp thỏm}} ~ {{m|vi|nhấp nhỏm||uneasy, fidgety}}.
